content: Singaporean-German footballer **Armin Maier bin Rafi** (born 10 July 1997) is a professional [footballer](/wiki/Association_football) who plays as a [midfielder](/wiki/Midfielder_(association_football)) for [Malaysia Super League](/wiki/Malaysia_Super_League) club [PDRM](/wiki/Polis_Diraja_Malaysia_FC). He is a former member of [Singapore national under-22 team](/wiki/Singapore_national_under-22_football_team). ## Club career ### Youth Maier started his career in the German club FC 07 Albstadt in his youth years, having migrated to Germany when he was 5 years old. ### Young Lions In 2017, he signed with the Singapore club, [Garena Young Lions](/wiki/Garena_Young_Lions) for the [2017 S.League](/wiki/2017_S.League) season. ### Selangor FC II He has officially joined the team [Selangor F.C. II](/wiki/Selangor_F.C._II) on 26 February 2020. He had a short spell with [Víkingur Ólafsvík](/wiki/Ungmennaf%C3%A9lagi%C3%B0_V%C3%ADkingur) in the [Icelandic third tier](/wiki/2._deild_karla) in May 2022. ## Career statistics As of 26 November 2022. Liga Interregional](/wiki/2._Liga_Interregional)10200–00102Total102000000102[Johor Darul Ta'zim II](/wiki/Johor_Darul_Ta%27zim_II_F.C.)(/wiki/2019_Malaysia_Premier_League)[Malaysia Premier League](/wiki/Malaysia_Premier_League)0000000000Total0000000000[Selangor FA II](/wiki/Selangor_FA_II)(/wiki/2020_Malaysia_Premier_League)[Malaysia Premier League](/wiki/Malaysia_Premier_League)1000000010Total1000000010[Víkingur Ólafsvík](/wiki/Ungmennaf%C3%A9lagi%C3%B0_V%C3%ADkingur)2022[2. deild karla](/wiki/2._deild_karla)4000000040Total4000000040[SV Heimstetten](/wiki/SV_Heimstetten)[2022–23](/wiki/2022%E2%80%9323_Regionalliga)[Regionalliga](/wiki/Regionalliga)1000000010Total1000000010Career total463000000463 ## International career Maier is eligible to play for Singapore due to his mother being a Singaporean. He played for the [under-23 side](/wiki/Singapore_national_under-23_football_team). He is also eligible to play for either [Germany](/wiki/Germany_national_football_team) or [Malaysia](/wiki/Malaysia_national_football_team), as he possesses a German passport and his grandfather was from the state of [Johor](/wiki/Johor). - Latest blip no setback for Maier - Armin Maier at Fupa This biographical article related to Singaporean association football is a stub. title: Armin Maier
